feed.title: Signature PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF: v.1.7.1
New release for Signature PDF: v.1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Traductions
  • Bug fixes
  • Updating js and css dependants

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF: v.1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix a bug that prevents the pdf from reloading (thanks to @jcarnu)
  • Updated fatfree to version 3.9.0 to be compatible with php 8.4
  • Add new public instance by @louis-vgn in https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/pull/130 : https://liber-it.fr/
  • Add new public instance by @rodinux in https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/pull/137 : https://signaturepdf.linux07.fr
  • New language Tamil by @TamilNeram
  • Kabyle traduction by @ButterflyOfFire
  • Basque traduction by @xabirequejo

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF: v1.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add specific CSS loading if exists, refers to #133 by @jcarnu in https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/pull/140

Documentation to customize css here : https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf?tab=readme-ov-file#customize-the-css

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.3...v1.7.4

entry.title: New release for Signature PDF: v1.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features

  • New homepage with the features list (@wincelau)
  • Add a watermark (@gpoma)
  • Change the color of signature elements (@gpoma) #103
  • Selectable text in the metadata section (@gpoma)
  • Configure the retention period for shared PDF files for signature (@gpoma) #90
  • Multi-line text in the signature section (by pressing Ctrl+Enter) (@gpoma)
  • Create a PDF from an image (@wincelau)

Improvements

  • New logo (@wincelau, @teymour)
  • Improved bash script (@ldidry)
  • New translations (@xabirequejo , @albanobattistella , @ButterflyOfFire , தமிழ்நேரம் , @valerio-bozzolan , Quentin PAGÈS, Ettore Atalan , Eryk Michalak)
  • Fixing issue #153 : Preserve internal PDF link through pdf-lib.js
  • Compression of images and ergonomics enhancemen (@wincelau)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/24eme/signaturepdf/compare/v1.7.4...v1.8.0
